lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a Kiva gift certificate, introducing the micro finance concept to me. I had the opportunity to choose the entrepreneur to receive the loan. It’s a great way for the two of us to share our interest in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, but I used to work in the arts, planning and promoting classical concerts.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in people's lives. I would like to give back what I have been given. I feel fortunate to have come so far myself.
lender.occupational_info: I help research doctors fiscally manage their grants.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: It really makes me feel good to help other people. I saw this as a great way to help someone out. I love this because it really is a gift that can keep on giving. As people pay off their loans, I can reinvest the money in the future of a new person.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked at a bank for the last eleven years.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I grew up in Honduras and saw first-hand how difficult it is for families in 3rd world countries to obtain loans and make a living.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language to children of immigrant families, mainly from Latin American countries.

lender.name: Leigh & Dana
lender.loan_because: to whom much was given, much is required...

lender.name: Ligia
lender.loan_because: I believe that we are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I teach yoga, this word means "union". In my country Kiva has no partners, because here entrepeneurs are not supported, poor people is given alms, so they keep dependent for life.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: It's such an amazing way to make an immediate impact, and to connect with other like-minded people.

lender.name: Gerry & Esther
lender.loan_because: Giving a hand up lasts a life time. Hand outs last only for moments

lender.name: Ray and Linda
lender.loan_because: I like helping people help themselves.

lender.name: sheena
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others help themselves.

lender.name: Karen and Peter
lender.loan_because: Because it feels good to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Marybeth & Scott
lender.loan_because: We all should. It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help to design and sell computer products all over the world.

lender.name: Inger
lender.loan_because: I want to help women who help themselves to get ahead.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: We are put on this earth to help our fellow man.
lender.occupational_info: Crazy at times but I like the people I work with.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I can; I am blessed to be able to help someone who needs it!
lender.occupational_info: I just left a job as a newspaper photographer and am currently working at a photography studio that does portraiture and wedding photography. Ultimately, I would like to do photography for an NGO, to help share the faces, stories and needs of the many under-privileged people in the world with other people who can help relieve those needs.

lender.name: Beatrice Rose
lender.loan_because: it seems to be helpful. Though thankful for my many blessings, I feel saddened and powerless at the intense greed of people; Of governments and corporations... Let's put humankinds' effort toward interaction and peace. This I hope.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying the history of Art - all kinds of Art! I hope to work in museums and teach about the art of different cultures.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I am blessed that I have so much in life. I hope that I can assist others in improving their lives and those around them.

lender.name: Doris
lender.loan_because: Throughout my life, help has appeared when I needed it most, be it money, advice, emotional support, or a hand up in business. Now I am in a position to be that hand up for someone else. It is enormously gratifying to know that my little loans make a difference: a perfect example of how even a small act of kindness can ripple through the lives of many people.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a computer to make artwork. I look carefully at documents to make them look their best. My art helps people understand words better.

lender.name: Loren & Deborah,sisters
lender.loan_because: Our lives have been so fortunate. We have both worked very hard to make our dreams come true. We want others to have such opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: Loren: I have a business background in Banking and Medical Transcription. Deborah: I am a Resident Physician.

lender.name: Rhannie
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good. I know, I know...I'm selfish...
lender.occupational_info: I help people figure out a way to keep a roof over their heads.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: it makes sense..(-:

lender.name: Moire & Michael
lender.loan_because: We can

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to directly support people who are motivated and work hard.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: it helps to redistribute some of the worlds wealth to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: i'm lucky i get to make people laugh.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: This is a really constructive way to help people build a business to support themselves and their families in the future. Give a man a fish and feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and feed him for life.
lender.occupational_info: I work full-time in molecular diagnostics but volunteer to assist low income and non-English speaking US taxpayers file tax returns to obtain tax creditsand refunds. I try to help people who are trying to help themselves

lender.name: Margie
lender.loan_because: Being able to make a living is better than receiving a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a veterinary clinic where I manage the breeding of mares and stallions as well as manage the horse and farm animal staff.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: It is possibly the single most rewarding thing I can do with my money, helping people lift themselves out of poverty through their own efforts.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to bless others.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I care and feel like this is the least I can do to help out others in need trying to make a difference

lender.name: Fried Family
lender.loan_because: We have alot and want to help others. We pick the buisinesses to loan to as a family with our two boys so they learn how to give and share.
lender.occupational_info: I get paid for investing money for clients in the US stock market.

lender.name: Kim & Kids
lender.loan_because: We feel like people in need of money should be helped.

lender.name: victoria
lender.loan_because: I love to help.
lender.occupational_info: A natural humanitarian trying to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I'm a dreamer too!

lender.name: Izabel
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful opportunity to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an editor at an academic publishing house.

lender.name: Mike & his girls
lender.loan_because: I would like our daughter to see the value and rewards of volunteerism, diligent work, and standing by one's word.
lender.occupational_info: I help promote businesses.

lender.name: Ed and Linda
lender.loan_because: We feel very grateful for the blessings in our lives and we would like to reach out, connect and share.

lender.name: romana
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping other people who are less fortune than I am.
lender.occupational_info: I am attending college. My major is economics with special intrest in economic development in Third World countries.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I am happy to have the opportunity to support people and their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I write programs for the United States Department Of Agriculture that give farmers and other users access to agricultural information on the web.

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be born in a country where opportunity is endless and I'd like contribute so others may feel the same way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm am an intensive care nurse in a hospital.

lender.name: Heidi & Jamey
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs to "pay it forward"!

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: the personal connection that I feel with people around the world is so amazing and meaningful. And I love joining with other Kiva lenders who also believe that by loaning globally we can make a difference; it is simply the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with adults who have mental and physical disabilities.

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: no hay nada mas bonito que poder ayudar a alguien ayudarse ~ theirs nothing more beutiful then helping someone help themselves
lender.occupational_info: soy de Medellin Colombia, me sostengo pintando,y haciendo trabajos de obrero, y estudio dos carreras a la ves (Español y Estudios Internacionales) en the Ohio State University

lender.name: Stealthflower
lender.loan_because: I'd like to contribute to other communities as well as my own, and help people have more choice.
lender.occupational_info: I develop vitamin supplements and give health advice and treatments.

lender.name: Genesis
lender.loan_because: I want to give something back and make it possible for other women to start their own businesses, like I did.
lender.occupational_info: I write informational articles for magazines and websites.

lender.name: The Clarkes
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Yong-Long Lai
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by their stories!
lender.occupational_info:
To empower the people around me to make a difference in the world!
Come and join our Kiva team and make a difference! http://www.kiva.org/team/yoursuccessclub

lender.name: James
lender.occupational_info: I make software which is (mainly) great fun but sometimes difficult and challenging and sometimes involves long hours.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to give back and make an investment in people building a future not just taking a handout. Having lived and traveled overseas I have seen first hand how much of an impact this type of work can have on an individuals life. Plus it makes me happy!
lender.occupational_info: I currently teach 7th and 8th grade English. I enjoy working with students and hopefully having a positive impact in how they choose to live their life.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: I have been helped in my life, it is now time to pass on the gift that I was given. If we all cared about one another, the world would be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who need help.

lender.name: Janine
lender.loan_because: what is a small amount to me can make a huge difference.

lender.name: Joseph & Megumi
lender.loan_because: from little things big things grow.
lender.occupational_info: I design and update my company's website and I teach English.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Debra Jo
lender.loan_because: It's not all about me. Because it is a way to see unity not segregation. Because I have been helped before and it can make a difference. Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I tattoo eyebrows or eye color or lip color on your face so it is permanently there. Sometimes I do this and make it look nature. If your face is different because of an accident and now your lips are not straight we can make them appear that way with skin tone colors. It is called corrective pigment camouflage, CPM, and you can use this technique if you have survived being burned or if you have Vitaligo, or alopecia. (Genetic hypo-pigmentation or hair loss diseases.) It can give continuity to skin and appearances. I also work with scars and many other traits. The work is SO rewarding. All I do is tattoo the outside and I get to be a piece of watching the inside heal! What a great position to be in. I wouldn't do anything else!

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: in a world where there's so much bad, it feels great to touch someone's life in a loving and meaningful way.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a great organization, and the work they do directly helps many people on a daily basis.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I know where the money is going and that it is making a direct impact on someone working hard to grow their business and care for their family. I also loan because I believe we should help each other as much as we are able to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a licensed Real Estate Assistant. We help people buy and sell their homes.

lender.name: Craig Eubanks
lender.loan_because: I like to help businesses. It's what I do.
lender.occupational_info:
I show businesses how to make more money, reach more clients/customers, and build direct marketing systems to increase profits. I like to call it, Revenue Engineering.
I also specialize in teaching hypnotherapists how to get more clients with less effort by using Direct Response Marketing.

lender.name: Donald Trump
lender.occupation: Chairman and president of The Trump Organization
lender.loan_because: Helping needy people is my passion!

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know that even though I can't give very much it will be appreciated by someone else who can really use it.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate research projects for children and adults who have fragile X syndrome and other developmental disabilities, such as autism.

lender.name: Katja
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: as a personal assistant I answer letters and emails, phonecalls etc on behalf of my boss.

lender.name: Traci
lender.loan_because: It's nice to be nice.

lender.name: Karsten
lender.loan_because:
I'm building up a business myself. Therefore i know how positive and motivating a helping hand can be.
Everything here begins with having confidence in someone.

lender.name: Reid
lender.loan_because: Jesus would :D

lender.name: shane
lender.loan_because: I can.I have a good job which pays well and I like to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to make the world a better place in my own small way.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: IM A TECH SUPPORT REP FOR DELL COMPUTERS (DESKTOP AND LAPTOP) AND PRINTERS. I HELP CUSTUMERS TO RESOLVE THEIR ISSUES OVER THE PHONE.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It is better to give than receive. Women need help to care for their children independently. Poverty is a "she."
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in healthcare and I am a lawyer who works for justice.

lender.name: Rafika
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Working to bring peace to the world through diplomatic measures.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for somebody.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: it's important to help others whenever we can.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: build pages for school books on a Mac

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: We all need a helping hand to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: designer of creative & inspiring products for the home and garden.

lender.name: Andrew and Tanya
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with so much.

lender.name: Satoshi
lender.occupational_info: Working for the trading company

lender.name: Uwe Keim
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is a good idea.

lender.name: Sandeep
lender.loan_because: I want to.
lender.occupational_info: I do research about how businesses can use computers and technology, and teach in a university.

lender.name: beeniru
lender.loan_because: 사람된 도리, because I.... Human......*^^*

lender.name: Roselyn
lender.loan_because: Maybe it will make a difference. I have been a working mother for 35 years, and would like to help other working mothers.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital laboratory performing medical testing to help doctors diagnose and treat illness.

lender.name: Eriko
lender.loan_because: I never lived without someone's help.So help someone who needs them.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I like being able to help others succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Physician Assistant student at the Medical University of South Carolina.

lender.name: Cideridies
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to build a stable life.

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: i believe it helps to distribute the planet's wealth and resources, and that small companies serving local communities creates a more sustainable world economy, and richer cultures. Plus, it feels great! :) Thank you Kiva!

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: Everybody has the power to make a difference and as a part of the human race we must all do our part.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: There is always someone who needs help.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for 30 years and now stay at home with my 10 year old daughter and am involved in all her daily activities and school.

lender.name: paulette
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to "spread the wealth" and give people equal opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I clean people's teeth mainly but , I also educate them as to how to clean their teeth at home.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: Development begins neither with "big business" nor with "aid" to corrupt governments, but with small entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Melanie and Sammy
lender.loan_because: What a difference we can make, one dollar at a time, helping other families.

lender.name: Summer
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help others. I know how lucky and blessed I am for the things I have. So, I need to grow up with knowing there are people out there that are far less fortunate who I can help.
lender.occupational_info: My mom is a Nurse and My Daddy is a reatail manager for a clothing company.

lender.name: Kayan
lender.loan_because: People in the world are just one big family and family help each other.

lender.name: Vivian
lender.loan_because: If I needed a loan I would want someone to lend me money. I would want that person to feel good about trusting me, and I would want the money to go to something worthy. If I can loan someone money to make their dreams come true for $25, then I will have a great day knowing that I am making a difference in someone's life. I pray God's best for the people who are giving and receiving through this website.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working doing Business Development for a government supply company.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: A little money can make a big impact, and I feel great helping someone achieve their dream. Kudos to Kiva for making our world smaller and connecting us to each other in a positive way.

lender.name: Jazminn and Greg
lender.loan_because: We want the world to be better. We believe that by helping another they in turn will help the world and make it better.
lender.occupational_info: Greg drives an 18 wheel truck delivering items important for the world to move. Jazminn takes phone calls and requests of all types and helps clients make their day better. We love giving and seeing happiness in all people.

lender.name: Shinji
lender.loan_because: I hope the world will be better.
lender.occupational_info: helping students to achieve their goals

lender.name: Jillian
lender.loan_because: I believe that every person deserves a chance.

lender.name: Karon
lender.loan_because: I believe in order to recieve you have to give first, and everyone needs a helping hand sometime in their life. Helping someone just a little can make a huge difference in in a person's life. I know I am a very fortunate person to have what I do, and I am able to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife and a mother of 3 young children. My husband owns his own business,I do all of the bookeeping for him plus so much more.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: God has been good to me and I want to share what He has given me.
lender.occupational_info: Buying and resell at a profit

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to provide an example for my son early on that it is necessary to give what you can and that helping someone, whether they are in your hometown or across the world, can make a difference. It really does feel better to give than to receive.
lender.occupational_info: I help families plan and book their dream vacations. I specialize in Disney Vacations and Cruises. I love my job and take pride in helping families reconnect and create new memories through the Magic of Disney.

lender.name: DonLev
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do & the Kiva idea is really innovative

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Global economic inequality is the greatest problem facing humanity today. Over 4 billion people live in abject poverty while the remaining 1/7th of the population pollute and use up resources at over 40 times the rate of their counterparts. There can be no peace until this inequality is addressed and corrected. Kiva offers an easy way for all of us to contribute towards the solution. After all, the greatest investment one can make is in your fellow man.

lender.name: Lory
lender.loan_because: Giving back puts a smile on my face. Helping people in this global world and economy just makes sense. Are you a Giver or is it "all about you"?
lender.occupational_info: Get outside in nature! Connect with others, make memories and enjoy life.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: I want to

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: Together we can change this world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate Agents.

lender.name: Marky
lender.loan_because: I care about the world and specifically women finding their way to support themselves. This is a small way I can help and I am happy to use this medium to make the world a little better for women world wide.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations creating training materials and deliver those materials or content to employees.

lender.name: Jillian
lender.loan_because: I've been so very fortunate and I want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital with inpatients and outpatients in need of physical therapy. I help get people moving again after surgeries, strokes, heart problems, or complications from diabetes and other illnesses.

lender.name: chikkudu
lender.loan_because: I want my friends to enjoy life
lender.occupational_info: live and love every moment of our lives

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: It is great to be able to help someone achieve one of their goals!

lender.name: Gracia & family
lender.loan_because: I wish to change the world

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage success and dreams in areas where the community is trying to pull you backwards.Please use this money and work very hard and be obsessed with customer service and quality
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate lawyer and help people buy,sell and mortgage property for businesses and families

lender.name: Paul and Sally
lender.loan_because: We think that it is a great privilege to be able to give back to the world.
lender.occupational_info:
Paul - I assist portfolio managers in performing financial market analysis. My company provides consulting services to asset managers, broker/dealers, and insurance companies.
Sally - I am a development director for a student organization. I raise funds in various ways to make a difference in students' campus lives.

lender.name: Tay
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a helping hand at one time or another whether it is money or your time. If you are in a position to help it is your responsibility to the human race.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a Creative Department and I am responsible for printing and web development

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I wish to help people realize their dreams, who would otherwise not have an opportunity to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I provide access to boats to those who cannot justify purchasing one on their own. I am currently a student of International Business.

lender.name: patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world one loan at a time. It makes me feel good inside.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a store manager for a retail chain.

lender.name: JoAnne
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me many, many times and it is only right that I try to help someone elese.
lender.occupational_info: I am a CPR and First Aid instructor. I teach others how to save victims by using CPR.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO HAVE MORE MATERIALS IN MY SHOP.
lender.occupational_info: IF I GOT SUPPORT OF THIS AMOUNT I NEED MY BUSSINESS WILL IMPROVE.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good!

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: I can. What a great way to give directly to so many around the world.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I believe that the best way to help others is to give them the tools to help themselves.

lender.name: Robb
lender.loan_because: I want to give back. Someone took a chance on me and loaned me money to start my business and now it is my turn to pay it forward.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I am an amateur motorcycle mechanic and otherwise just getting by.

lender.name: Mark Strode & Family
lender.loan_because: I understand the power of credit, when well used, to expand the economic and social impact of individuals.

lender.name: Harkins Family
lender.loan_because: We can.
lender.occupational_info: We're a family of 5. Dad creates business opportunities for a large youth serving non-profit organization. Mom works for a hospital. Two kids in college, 2 in high school, 1 in middle school.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: It is very exiciting to see what a small amount of money can do to help families across the world. Running a business to support your family takes passion, drive and lots of hard work and I am grateful to be able to help people achive their personal goals.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: "So powerful is the light of unity that it can illuminate the whole earth." - Baha'u'llah

lender.name: Navjeet
lender.occupational_info: I work to streamline business using IT

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to help women around the world, who in turn will help everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a clinic that serves patients with long standing chronic pain.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.occupation: Media Manager, Advertising @ The Home Depot Canada
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: it is a moral imperative.
lender.occupational_info: Management consulting and investments

lender.name: Signe
lender.loan_because: someone made me a small loan once upon a time, and it made a big difference in my life. Now it's my turn to do the same for others.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: people need capital
lender.occupational_info: I work from my home assisting other businesses with their computer systems

lender.name: CYNTHIA
lender.loan_because: I love helping people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I give medical advice on the telephone.

lender.name: BONNIE
lender.loan_because: I've been so blessed in my life, (just by where I was born and to whom I was born ), that I feel that it is both my duty and my pleasure to share with others. I also believe that any money that I might have is really God's money, and the Bible says that when we help the least of our brothers and sisters we are helping Jesus. We are also to love others as we love ourselves. Also, when I do share , I feel wonderful. It's a real high!

lender.name: Bisma
lender.loan_because: I feel being fortunate myself, it is my duty to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I have a business and understand that working captial is important for a successful buisness.

lender.name: B Marden
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Sue
lender.occupation: Principal and Senior Consultant at Actuarial Firm
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I own my own business. I know the struggle and difficulty of trying to obtain working capital and loans. For the people that these loans go to, it may be near impossible. I want to give these people the oppertunities that I had to create a business of their own.
lender.occupational_info: I provide family entertainment to corporations, schools and churches.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Every human deserves a shot at making their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: Working with children every day is the greatest job on the planet!

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful idea to help those who are trying to make a living but are having a hard time due to various circumstances in their life. To give a person a break in life is a wonderful gift and one that I am grateful to be able to give.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: The idea of microfinance support for local market-based entrepreneurship is critical to raising world wide standards of living. Small is beautiful.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses become more successful.

lender.name: King Theo
lender.loan_because: Im a lover and a barker.
lender.occupational_info: I remind people to love... me.

lender.name: Pem
lender.occupation: Development Associate at NARAL Pro-Choice MA
lender.loan_because: microcredit can change lives.

lender.name: Anne-Marie
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all connected and interdependent.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist who designs for prints and the internet..

lender.name: Jasmine & Brad
lender.loan_because: We want to help people in need, people who were not born into our circumstances but born into poverty. Many people in our lives have believed in us and supported us. We want to share some of that support & hope to help make a positive difference in someone's life. Our country, the U.S. has so much more & so much excess, material excess, that we do not need, how can we not give, how can we not share? And how AWESOME is it, that instead of going to a movie or dining out, or buying a new gadget we DO NOT NEED, we can give $25.00 and change someone's life! =)

lender.name: Reneida
lender.loan_because: It's more than just donating. It is giving somebody the opportunity to progress and improve his or her life not just once, but many times over.

lender.name: Shelby
lender.loan_because: I love helping out people!

lender.name: Jeni
lender.occupational_info: I am in commercial real estate managment.

lender.name: Brian & Daungnate
lender.loan_because: I love the microloan concept and how Kiva has found a way to use web technology for something so positive. We can all participate and make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I manage software development projects.

lender.name: Renay
lender.loan_because: I feel like I'm helping someone to better their life.

lender.name: Paul Marlisa
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Support other people when they are sick.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: We're all one.

lender.name: Lindzel
lender.loan_because: I understand that I've been a very, very fortunate girl and that not everyone is as well taken care of.

lender.name: Rob W
lender.loan_because: I take a long term view of the world but have only a short lifetime to make some difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a National Park known for its historic buildings and setting. My work involves preserving and reusing these buildings while protecting their historic integrity.

lender.name: Siv
lender.loan_because: it is a small way to repay the people who have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I build treatment plants to treat and remediate contaminated water and soils.

lender.name: SC
lender.loan_because: I believe in it!
lender.occupational_info: I help my company sell patient monitoring solutions to hospitals.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: There is need.
lender.occupational_info: Management of commercial real estate and financial investments for trusts.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a quality inspector in a wire factory.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: You can really see the impact your loan has on an individual basis...and it feels good to help people work toward their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I write and direct for TV. I spend a lot of time behind a computer using my imagination. When I'm not working I spend as much time as I can with my family.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because:
I am not claiming to be an expert, nor do I have all the answers. I am claiming to share what I know, to be in your corner, to be a friend, to help you, to guide you, to listen to you, to learn from you, and to experience a life full of abundance with you. One day at a time!
GOD BLESS!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a widower and really enjoy internet marketing. I consider what I do A labor of love.

lender.name: Sandi
lender.loan_because: my small loan makes a huge difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: I recieve so much love and sharing from my community, I want to return that love and pass it on to others . It completes the circle of giving and recieiving . I believe we are all one and together we can heal our world with love and joy! I am so amazed with all the wonderful beings trying to make a difference in their lives. I am so blessed I can give back and share with others so they can live their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: The work I am doing is to promote God first... After working in the capital world for 37 plus years I am now living quietly in the priviate sector, and beginning to rise to my calling. Giving back and helping others to build a positive life with God first and loving one another. its time for all faiths to come together for the purpose of peace and learning from one another. God Bless Kat

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: Everybody should be able to follow a dream and we are all people just trying to make a life

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I now see that borrowers are diligent in repaying their loans, and my original loans can be re-loaned many times, making the impact even larger. My focus in making loans is Eastern Europe, and parts of the former USSR. My three original loans are now multiplied into nine loans.
lender.occupational_info: My formal training is in human nutrition, and I've worked as a dietitian for over 20 years. I now divide my time between wellness coaching and speaking. My passion is public speaking, and I coach speakers to "find their voice" and communicate better.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe we need to share with the poor.
lender.occupational_info: I work extensively with my church since I've retired.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase chemicals and packaging used to make hair shampoo.

lender.name: Ann Elise & Dan
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to give back to the world more than I have taken.
lender.occupational_info: I have the pleasure of spending my workday teaching children everything from dividing by a 2-digit divisor to our solar system to the first colonists of America to the unlocking the exciting world of reading. I'm so lucky!

lender.name: Thad
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Roemer
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Josephine
lender.loan_because: Our family is very blessed and lucky and we just want to share what we can.

lender.name: caroline and bill
lender.loan_because: We'd like to see positive change in our world. We'd like to see a world where everyone has an opportunity to provide for themselves and their families and live healthy, happy and productive lives.
lender.occupational_info: Caroline works on legal issues related to banks and lending money. Bill works in video game development.

lender.name: kristen
lender.loan_because: this is the best way to make a lasting difference and it makes you feel good!
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government helping juvenile delinquents and abused and negelected children.

lender.name: Amelia & Her Family
lender.loan_because: I loan because it makes me feel good to help improve families' lives. My Papa funds my suggestions as he wants to be a partner in building things; people, business, the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a little girl growing up with two of the best parents and my work right now is to help other Mamas and Papas with their jobs. My Mama stays at home and helps me grow, learn and play. My Papa works in San Francisco, California, USA as a telecommunications engineer.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed much, and Kiva provides me a chance to give to others.
lender.occupational_info: Our company is a marketing agency in the Detroit area. My department produces the quarterly magazines for some GM vehicle owners.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because:
This is a great way to help people to help themselves. Better yet, a repaid loan can go on to help another person, then another.
It is rewarding to follow the progress of the persons receiving the loans.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs.

lender.name: Joachim
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone who is interested in working hard to support themselves.

lender.name: kang yao
lender.loan_because: there's money in my paypal, its better to help people rather than lot the money sits there.
lender.occupational_info: i am practising dhamma, at the same time freelancing in graphic design and art direction.

lender.name: Kanda
lender.loan_because: It feels like the right thing to do, empowering people to help themselves and hopefully, to make just a tiny little difference in this world.

lender.name: Gary & Dorothy
lender.loan_because: Capitalism works!
lender.occupational_info: I designed computer systems for such companies and Intel and Apple. Dorothy worked in Marketing for Intel.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: Alternative energy and environmental sustainability initiatives at Sears Holdings.

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving back to the global community is an important part of life
lender.occupational_info: I manage a number of fast food outlets in a small city in Australia.

lender.name: Lonnie
lender.loan_because: I can....

lender.name: marleen
lender.loan_because: lets give each other a helping hand together we can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: i buy and sell wine, i go out and get to try many new wines from all over the world

lender.name: call me Ed the friend
lender.loan_because: I would like for you to do so too...

lender.name: Chii-Lih
lender.loan_because: There is no god.

lender.name: Wolfgang
lender.loan_because:
I am running a small business myself and understand the struggle to stay ahead.
I also know how wonderful and how much fun it can be.
I am still supporting our endeavor with my night job, but wife Diane and I are very optimist that we are on our way and both agreed it is time to share now.
lender.occupational_info:
We have a fife acre garden with a nursery woven inside. It is so beautiful we host garden tours several times a year.
On the other hand we are still somewhat farmers and still grow a lot of our plants.
My partner and wife consults people on better gardening with a goal to more sustainable suburban front and back yards.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: In honour of my father

lender.name: Khachik
lender.loan_because: i want to help.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate in my life and I am excited to be able to help others in this way.
lender.occupational_info: I am an actor in theatre and television in Los Angeles, California.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach biology (life science) and geology (earth science) at the high school level.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I know how great it feels when someone lends a helping hand. I wanted to pass that feeling on to somone who asked for assistance to create their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own company, Amy J Productions. I work as a theatre technician and teach children's theatre workshops. Learn! Laugh! Play!

lender.name: J.T.
lender.loan_because: I can afford to. I have been blessed with more than I need, so I'm just passing along some of the extra to those who have not been as fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a lab. When people donate their organs, I help match the donated organs to people who need them.

lender.name: Vaibhav
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance to alleviate world poverty.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I feel responsible to help others that are less fortunate than I am.
lender.occupational_info: I am a substitute teacher working mainly with children ages 5 - 12. I retired from banking where I was employed as a loan officer and a marketing representative.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: It is right to give towards productive actions, Kiva has created a win-win for small business owners here. We are all world citizens and I believe in helping others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: My industry is: Digital Advertising

lender.name: good-loaf
lender.loan_because: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I currently live in Indonesia as an expat working as a Business Advisor for a major oil& gas company. My job is esstentially to ensure that we make the best business decisions possible for both our company and the Country of Indonesia and that we deliver on our promises.

lender.name: Miki
lender.loan_because: I like it!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity for me to help people get an economic start. And I really like helping a particular person with a particular project.
lender.occupational_info: I lead worship and preach and visit the sick and shut in and teach and attend a lot of meetings.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: From time to time, I have been extremely grateful for another person's help. If I can help someone better their life, then I should.
lender.occupational_info: I teach psychology at a university in Hong Kong, China.

lender.name: Sofia
lender.loan_because:
I believe there is goodness in all of us. As citizens of the world, we have the responsibility to contribute and learn to share our wealth big or small with one another. We have the power to change and set an example for today's & future generations...
"TO THE WORLD YOU MAY BE ONE PERSON, BUT TO ONE PERSON YOU MAY BE THE WORLD"...... unknown

lender.name: ann
lender.loan_because: I care!
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time mother of three amazing children.My husband is a dedicated school teacher. They fill my life with joy.

lender.name: arualem
lender.loan_because: “Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.”

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: It's fun, it's easy, and it makes me feel connected to the rest of the world.

lender.name: Terence
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better cause than turning people's lives around by enabling them to become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I just spent the past two years working at CitySquash, a small non-profit organization in the Bronx, NY that teaches urban youth the sport of squash while at the same time helping them with their schoolwork and exposing them to new opportunities.

lender.name: Wilzelf
lender.loan_because: I like this kind of help. I think it motivates people to go for it more when they know other people believe in their work.
lender.occupational_info: Repairing & supporting computer problems, mostly at peoples houses and/or bussinesses.

lender.name: SUSAN
lender.loan_because: I needed help to learn to become self-sufficient and I value that for others.

lender.name: kimiko
lender.loan_because: I watch many sad news on TV.People kill someone for money ,revenge etc.Everyone has right to live happily.When I come to this site I feel people's warm heart and love.They just want to help. I just wanted to be one of them.,
lender.occupational_info: I am teaching Japanese language to Singaporian.

lender.name: Hedigers
lender.loan_because: We believe in this business concept
lender.occupational_info: I combine my Medical with my business background when consulting public and private sector on healthcare solutions

lender.name: Tomoko
lender.loan_because: I believe someone who has hope can make the world a better place.

lender.name: Wil
lender.loan_because: God said give abundantly and ye shall receive abundantly. So I give from the heart not expecting to receive, just knowing the lord has blessed me enough to give reassures me God is giving me abundantly.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company with many locations and I am responsible for running the back office for many of the locations.

lender.name: luc
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: David Watson
lender.loan_because: it really is better to give than receive
lender.occupational_info: I work in technology in the UK and Spain

lender.name: Gloria & Cal
lender.loan_because: individuals deserve a chance to follow their dreams. We also support Brenda in Mexico and Carlos in Ecuador through SOS Children Villages--see link below.

lender.name: Kate & Colin
lender.loan_because: My family and I now have more than we need. We believe that anything more than that is only useful if it can help others, as we have been helped when we were in need ourselves.

lender.name: Mattias
lender.loan_because: I simply want to help people out of their poverty.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I can! I would like to share my Blessings!

lender.name: Mary Lou
lender.loan_because: There is a need. God blesses me to be in a position to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work with terminally ill patients and their families.

lender.name: Guillermo
lender.loan_because: Many small people who in many small places do many small things that can alter the face of the world
lender.occupational_info: I'm lucky to work in a technical position in the security information industry, job that enjoy so much.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I encourage individuals to support NGOs such as KIVA working on MDGs, (Millennium Goals).

lender.name: Michael Onarheim
lender.loan_because: I think we can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: At Eco Energy Holding we make machines that can make fuel more eco friendly by adding water through a process known as microemulsion.

lender.name: margarita
lender.loan_because: I believe in the Golden Rule.
lender.occupational_info: teach children between the ages of 10-13.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: A handup is better than a handout. People seek dignity.

lender.name: Risa
lender.loan_because: I want to empower other small business owners, particularly women, to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I am office manager of an insurance agency, but I have also started my own business, sharing skin care and spa products with women. I am part of a great company that empowers women every day to dare to make their dreams a reality.

lender.name: Mike & Angie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: jmar8692
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of lending money to the enterprising people. This can hopefully create much more benefit than just giving money to regular charity (i.e. less risk of corruption or uselessly spent money).
lender.occupational_info: We develop software for laptops equipped with our fingerprint readers, so the users can for example login to Windows or their favourite web page using their fingerprints instead of typing username and password.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: people need a hand in life and if I am able, I will give.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps.

lender.name: Shafqat
lender.loan_because: This may help someone in need and is a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I make computer programs which is used by many people to do things faster and easily.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: To be so blessed in my own life, How can I not.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I am embarking on person-to-person loans as a financial hobby, one where I can help others by loaning them money at a modest interest rate.
lender.occupational_info: I develop online courses and websites for agencies that cannot afford to work with commercial companies.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It is my Humanitrian duty to help my fellow man who is willing to help him/her self

lender.name: Sauro
lender.loan_because: “Pongo attenzione alle esigenze degli altri, imparo ad ascoltare”

lender.name: Lynae
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all part of one big community and are meant to help each other. Serving in the Peace Corps and lending on Kiva are the two ways I have chosen to try to make this a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a volunteer for Peace Corps, USA and am currently serving in Ukraine as a community developer.

lender.name: Jori
lender.loan_because: I'm a single mom and I have been blessed with so many things in my life. It's such an inspiration to see people helping other people to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital to make sure the bills are paid, the employees are paid and provide information to make business decisions. We are a not-for-profit organization, but we still have to run a smart business so that we can provide healthcare to anyone who walks through the door.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: Progress is a great thing to make.
lender.occupational_info: I write and draw comic books.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of loaning the money instead of giving it.... it allows the person to feel dignity in achievement and not just hand outs.... this way it allows the person to continue to provide for themselves and their family.. it also fulfills one of the principles of Christ ... and there is nothing better than that...
lender.occupational_info: I am a landscape designer... placing what God has created in a pleasing way....I am very familiar with all kinds of plants... I know how to plant seeds, nuture them, patiently wait for growth and then return for a harvest...

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help make development work.
lender.occupational_info: I advise companies, often large corporations, on how to improve themselves.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: I live a comfortable life and want to give something back to causes and individuals in need.
lender.occupational_info: graphic artist studying to become an elementary school teacher

lender.name: Shelby & Olivia
lender.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place for everyone. We have so much while others have so little. We can help in our own small way.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I essentially made myself into who I am today and value the concept of hard work to achieve your dreams. At the age of 25 I now own two homes and have put myself through college. I now want to give back to those that are trying to make a difference and just need a helping hand. Having served 5 years in the US Marine Corps I have visited many different countries and have seen third-world poverty. Any thing that I can do to make a difference in a persons life is my reward!
lender.occupational_info: I test software and implement/troubleshoot systems for the Dept. of Defense

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: If everyone shares we all prosper

lender.name: kris
lender.loan_because: I believe in and pursue helping my brothers and sisters in life.
lender.occupational_info: I advise people in need

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: My new business venture is making one-of-a-kind jewelry and accessories. When I see another woman utilizing creativity, available resources and business acumen it resonates and, regardless of which continent she is from, I feel a common bond.
lender.occupational_info: I make one-of-a-kind jewelry and accessories with natural stones, precious metals, vintage charms, and beads handmade from other artists around the world.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference

lender.name: Scot
lender.occupation: Writer of fantasy and science fiction
lender.loan_because: While our technical progess is amazing, a daily wonder, sometimes it is difficult to believe in the progress of humanity. Kiva allows technology and humanity to walk hand in hand toward a better future. Bravo, Kiva, and blessings to each and every lender and entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: In my day job, I write marketing copy for web sites. For fun, fame, and friends, I write stories and novels of science and fantasy fiction.

lender.name: Kelly and John
lender.loan_because: Life is short -- live it well.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can and because it is the right thing to do. What better way to take stock of what blessings we have than to make ourselves seek out those who have less and actively take action in helping these people help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I am a service provider to other businesses in Florida, USA. We clean and maintain commercial buildings.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping someone reach their dream. What a great way to give back to the world opportunities to help others.

lender.name: Hannes
lender.loan_because: I know that money is necessary to start a business
lender.occupational_info: I help companies to define their Strategy and to set up Finance and Organisational structures.

lender.name: Cary
lender.loan_because: I have a moral obligation to give to others in order to live a spritiually fulfilling life
lender.occupational_info: My company provides billing services for utilities such as water, gas and electricity

lender.name: Sue & Krista
lender.loan_because: If you know the good, you do the good.
lender.occupational_info: Sue manages rental properties. Krista is doing her degree in International Development.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Pay it Forward

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to help someone make their dream come true :)
lender.occupational_info: I help companies provide Health Insurance for their companies

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I want to help on behalf of my children and in the spirit that good things are possible for good people.
lender.occupational_info: I write songs and music, produce records and work as a sound engineer. I also play guitar and many other instruments.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I care about others and want to support them in their efforts to provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I have the honor of helping a woman bring her newborn baby into the world!

lender.name: Bradley Banks
lender.loan_because: Those who can, should.

lender.name: Gustavo
lender.loan_because: I want to do my best to generate ideas to have a better world.

lender.name: Glenn & Jasmin
lender.loan_because: We're so happy that Kiva has created this connection between those who are in need and those who are fortunate enough to be in the situation to be able to help. We agree with Sir Winston Churchill when he said: "We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give. "

lender.name: Anura
lender.loan_because: I like to see technology being used for good of the many.
lender.occupational_info: I am a secondary school art teacher.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help an honest, ambitious individual who needs a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I make movies!

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: John 3:15

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: everyone has the potential to make their lives better. If we can provide that initial lift to help others to do that, it can make a world of difference.
lender.occupational_info: I try to work in jobs that allow me to help others around the world. Right now I am an assistant in an international development company that teaches people how to build successful businesses, both in the U.S. and abroad.

lender.name: Jim & Janet
lender.loan_because: This is such a fantastic and great use of the internet! This website reduces the size of our world and allows us to be connected to one another. This allows us to reach out and help many people over time.
lender.occupational_info: Caring for people through the medical and nursing professions.

lender.name: Tamika
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do! Help those in need.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to help people, especially women, get out of poverty. Its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm active in working on issues dealing with social justice and civil rights. I also do photography, focusing on children and women in countries ranging from Albania to Guatemala.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the opportunity to express their talents, build a thriving business, and live a joyful life.
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals and couples create positive changes in their lives and relationships.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I think it's a simple gesture that can go a long way.

lender.name: carmen
lender.loan_because: WANT TO GIVE IN RETURN FOR MY TWO GREAT AND HEATHY DAUGHTERS GOD HAS GAVE ME.
lender.occupational_info: LEARNING ABOUT PEOPLE

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: i like giving a hand up to people who want to make a better life for themselves and their family.

lender.name: PAMELA
lender.loan_because: I love KIVA's mission

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because:
The little amount that I loan makes a relatively huge difference in someone else's ability to make a living.
I just feel that I'm blessed to be in a position to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Making pretty pictures.

lender.name: Mick
lender.loan_because: everyone benefits from small business.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a hospital, keeping their computers going.

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: I care. Sometimes all it takes is a little help to see someone on their way to sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: I pay the bills and collect the receivables for my organization. I also help ensure that the accounting records are in order.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to make their dreams happen.
lender.occupational_info: Tim designs and develops automotive components for car companies.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I wish to make a positive contribution to the world and do so in an intimate way that helps individuals and families who strive for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of 12 professional planners and engineers and permit specialists who plan, design, permit, and oversee construction of improvements to a park and recreation system of 26 different state parks.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I'd like to provide an opportunity for someone, like the opportunities provided to me.

lender.name: LEISUREHAMMOCKS.COM
lender.loan_because: we are one small family business helping another, wherever that may be in the world

lender.name: Marisol & Mike
lender.loan_because: I can´t find a better way to help people, than to believe in their ideas.

lender.name: Loralee
lender.loan_because: my little contribution can make a BIG difference.

lender.name: Heather and family
lender.loan_because: We can

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: My work is helping others thru the testing process of colonoscopys and endoscopys which are done mostly for precancer detection.

lender.name: Tonya
lender.loan_because: I believe in the butterfly effect.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Leslee
lender.loan_because: For me, Kiva is extending the Lord's helping hand one small loan at a time!

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that we can all help in a small way that will make a HUGE difference, think about what else you would spend that $25 on???
lender.occupational_info: I work with people, I listen to their stories and try to help out the best that I can. (there are many diff areas but that's the just of it)

lender.name: natasha
lender.loan_because: I am greatful for those who have helped me achieve and I want to share that gift
lender.occupational_info: I aid those in the persuit of modifying their environment for a better way of living

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I've worked very hard all my life and would like to share my good fortune with others who work hard as well so that they can enjoy the fruits of their own labor.

lender.name: HENRY
lender.loan_because: I NEED IT TO IMPROVE EXPAND MY BUSINESS.
lender.occupational_info: I AM A LOCAL TRADER, THAT SELLS AROUND MY LOCALITY. AND I NEED TO EXPAND MY BUSINESS BY A STEP. PLEASE.

lender.name: Rivux
lender.loan_because: "The price good men pay for indifference to public affairs is to be ruled by evil men" - Plato

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: micro-credit loans are a simple and effective way to help others achieve their goals and dreams.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good. I was born into the richest country in the world and had easy access to an education. I realize how fortunate I am and want to help. My children are involved with Kiva also so it has been a great lesson for us. (my four year old took this picture)
lender.occupational_info: Technology, Security and Mommy!

lender.name: Natalia Corres
lender.loan_because: I grew up in the lower income strata of society and received kindness & help from caring people so that opportunities were opened to me. This allows me to pass that help forward.
lender.occupational_info: My work is comprised of concepts and bringing them to reality through creative entrepreneurship. I am a technologist, an artist and a writer.

lender.name: Toshikazu
lender.loan_because: I hear that they must spend money more significantly than my friend.

lender.name: Fatima
lender.loan_because: I know they are working hard to help their family and this is also my own way of sharing and giving back to the community.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I care
